: : Darkangel : :
Darkangel decides to go check on Dreadplague. Once in the CR room, he can barely hear her voice. He opens the CR.
Darkangel: Dreadplague, are you ok? Were you saying angel?
 Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:Tyrael smiled.

Tyrael: And you are welcomed, Deathsteel. Come with me, I will brief
you on the situation on this planet.

He moves to another room where a huge holodisplay is.

Tyrael: Please have a seat.

In the cr chambers room, the auto-surgeo had finished removing the
harpoon that had been stuck in Dreadplague. She was conscious and
looked around, but her sight was all just a blur. She called out, but
her voice was a mere whisper.

Dreadplague: Angel... Angel... Where... are you?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> DeathSteel::
> 
> He looked at Tyrael. "Hmm,  there are more differences than I 
> realized. Yet, I beleive I can work within the perameters you have 
> for your group. The one common goal we all share, the end of the 
> Maximals. Through this, I can function in your group. I shall be 
> loyal and work with the other bots. You have my alliegence."  And 
> with that he bowed to Tyrael. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael: So you are a decepticon, right? I must warn you, then, that 
> we
> > Tripredacus are very unlike the decepticons. We are teamworkers and
> > loyal to each other. Therefore, I have to warn you that if your
> > initial programing hinders our group, I will have to implant a
> > Tripredacus chip on you. I hope you understand me.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > DeathSteel::
> > > 
> > > He looked at Tyrael. "I come from an old planet. One that is 
> ruled by 
> > > the Decepticons. I was on a mission to get to a moon so we could 
> fix 
> > > the solar power collectors when a black hole hole opened up and 
> > > pulled my ship into it.  When I came out the other side, my ship 
> was 
> > > about to fall apart. I laned here."
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > Tyrael nodded as Deathsteel bowed.
> > > > 
> > > > Tyrael: Welcome in the ranks of the Tripredacus, Deathsteel. I 
> am
> > > > Major Tyrael, Tripredacus commander on Earth. Where do you come 
> > > from,
> > > > if I may ask?
> > > > 
> > > >
